verses.verse: So all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> were reckoned by genealogies;<WH3187> and, behold,<WH2009> they were written<WH3789> in<WH5921> the book<WH5612> of the kings<WH4428> of Israel<WH3478> and Judah,<WH3063> who were carried away<WH1540> to Babylon<WH894> for their transgression.<WH4604>

Now the first<WH7223> inhabitants<WH3427> that<WH834> dwelt in their possessions<WH272> in their cities<WH5892> were, the Israelites,<WH3478> the priests,<WH3548> Levites,<WH3881> and the Nethinims.<WH5411>

And in Jerusalem<WH3389> dwelt<WH3427> of<WH4480> the children<WH1121> of Judah,<WH3063> and of<WH4480> the children<WH1121> of Benjamin,<WH1144> and of<WH4480> the children<WH1121> of Ephraim,<WH669> and Manasseh;<WH4519>

Uthai <WH5793> the son<WH1121> of Ammihud,<WH5989> the son<WH1121> of Omri,<WH6018> the son<WH1121> of Imri,<WH566> the son<WH1121> of Bani,<WH1137> of the children<WH4480> <WH1121> of Pharez<WH6557> the son<WH1121> of Judah.<WH3063>
And of<WH4480> the Shilonites;<WH7888> Asaiah<WH6222> the firstborn,<WH1060> and his sons.<WH1121>
And of<WH4480> the sons<WH1121> of Zerah;<WH2226> Jeuel,<WH3262> and their brethren,<WH251> six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> and ninety.<WH8673>
And of<WH4480> the sons<WH1121> of Benjamin;<WH1144> Sallu<WH5543> the son<WH1121> of Meshullam,<WH4918> the son<WH1121> of Hodaviah,<WH1938> the son<WH1121> of Hasenuah,<WH5574>

And Ibneiah<WH2997> the son<WH1121> of Jeroham,<WH3395> and Elah<WH425> the son<WH1121> of Uzzi,<WH5813> the son<WH1121> of Michri,<WH4381> and Meshullam<WH4918> the son<WH1121> of Shephathiah,<WH8203> the son<WH1121> of Reuel,<WH7467> the son<WH1121> of Ibnijah;<WH2998>

And their brethren,<WH251> according to their generations,<WH8435> nine<WH8672> hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572> and six.<WH8337> All<WH3605> these<WH428> men<WH376> were chief<WH7218> of the fathers<WH1> in the house<WH1004> of their fathers.<WH1>
And of<WH4480> the priests;<WH3548> Jedaiah,<WH3048> and Jehoiarib,<WH3080> and Jachin,<WH3199>

And Azariah<WH5838> the son<WH1121> of Hilkiah,<WH2518> the son<WH1121> of Meshullam,<WH4918> the son<WH1121> of Zadok,<WH6659> the son<WH1121> of Meraioth,<WH4812> the son<WH1121> of Ahitub,<WH285> the ruler<WH5057> of the house<WH1004> of God;<WH430>

And Adaiah<WH5718> the son<WH1121> of Jeroham,<WH3395> the son<WH1121> of Pashur,<WH6583> the son<WH1121> of Malchijah,<WH4441> and Maasiai<WH4640> the son<WH1121> of Adiel,<WH5717> the son<WH1121> of Jahzerah,<WH3170> the son<WH1121> of Meshullam,<WH4918> the son<WH1121> of Meshillemith,<WH4921> the son<WH1121> of Immer;<WH564>

And their brethren,<WH251> heads<WH7218> of the house<WH1004> of their fathers,<WH1> a thousand<WH505> and seven<WH7651> hundred<WH3967> and threescore;<WH8346> very able men<WH1368> <WH2428> for the work<WH4399> of the service<WH5656> of the house<WH1004> of God.<WH430>

And of<WH4480> the Levites;<WH3881> Shemaiah<WH8098> the son<WH1121> of Hasshub,<WH2815> the son<WH1121> of Azrikam,<WH5840> the son<WH1121> of Hashabiah,<WH2811> of<WH4480> the sons<WH1121> of Merari;<WH4847>
And Bakbakkar,<WH1230> Heresh,<WH2792> and Galal,<WH1559> and Mattaniah<WH4983> the son<WH1121> of Micah,<WH4316> the son<WH1121> of Zichri,<WH2147> the son<WH1121> of Asaph;<WH623>

And Obadiah<WH5662> the son<WH1121> of Shemaiah,<WH8098> the son<WH1121> of Galal,<WH1559> the son<WH1121> of Jeduthun,<WH3038> and Berechiah<WH1296> the son<WH1121> of Asa,<WH609> the son<WH1121> of Elkanah,<WH511> that dwelt<WH3427> in the villages<WH2691> of the Netophathites.<WH5200>
And the porters<WH7778> were, Shallum,<WH7967> and Akkub,<WH6126> and Talmon,<WH2929> and Ahiman,<WH289> and their brethren:<WH251> Shallum<WH7967> was the chief;<WH7218>
Who hitherto<WH5704> <WH2008> waited in the king's<WH4428> gate<WH8179> eastward:<WH4217> they<WH1992> were porters<WH7778> in the companies<WH4264> of the children<WH1121> of Levi.<WH3878>

And Shallum<WH7967> the son<WH1121> of Kore,<WH6981> the son<WH1121> of Ebiasaph,<WH43> the son<WH1121> of Korah,<WH7141> and his brethren,<WH251> of the house<WH1004> of his father,<WH1> the Korahites,<WH7145> were over<WH5921> the work<WH4399> of the service,<WH5656> keepers<WH8104> of the gates<WH5592> of the tabernacle:<WH168> and their fathers,<WH1> being over<WH5921> the host<WH4264> of the LORD,<WH3068> were keepers<WH8104> of the entry.<WH3996>
And Phinehas<WH6372> the son<WH1121> of Eleazar<WH499> was<WH1961> the ruler<WH5057> over<WH5921> them in time past,<WH6440> and the LORD<WH3068> was with<WH5973> him.
And Zechariah<WH2148> the son<WH1121> of Meshelemiah<WH4920> was porter<WH7778> of the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation.<WH4150>

All <WH3605> these which were chosen<WH1305> to be porters<WH7778> in the gates<WH5592> were two hundred<WH3967> and twelve.<WH8147> <WH6240> These<WH1992> were reckoned by their genealogy<WH3187> in their villages,<WH2691> whom David<WH1732> and Samuel<WH8050> the seer<WH7203> did ordain<WH3245> in their set office.<WH530>

So they<WH1992> and their children<WH1121> had the oversight<WH5921> of the gates<WH8179> of the house<WH1004> of the LORD,<WH3068> namely, the house<WH1004> of the tabernacle,<WH168> by wards.<WH4931>
In four<WH702> quarters<WH7307> were<WH1961> the porters,<WH7778> toward the east,<WH4217> west,<WH3220> north,<WH6828> and south.<WH5045>
And their brethren,<WH251> which were in their villages,<WH2691> were to come<WH935> after seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> from time<WH4480> <WH6256> to<WH413> time<WH6256> with<WH5973> them.<WH428>

For <WH3588> these<WH1992> Levites,<WH3881> the four<WH702> chief<WH1368> porters,<WH7778> were in their set office,<WH530> and were<WH1961> over<WH5921> the chambers<WH3957> and treasuries<WH214> of the house<WH1004> of God.<WH430>

And they lodged<WH3885> round about<WH5439> the house<WH1004> of God,<WH430> because<WH3588> the charge<WH4931> was upon<WH5921> them, and the opening<WH4668> thereof every morning<WH1242> <WH1242> pertained to them.<WH1992>
And certain of<WH4480> them had the charge of<WH5921> the ministering<WH5656> vessels,<WH3627> that<WH3588> they should bring them in<WH935> and out<WH3318> by tale.<WH4557>

Some of<WH4480> them also were appointed<WH4487> to oversee<WH5921> the vessels,<WH3627> and all<WH3605> the instruments<WH3627> of the sanctuary,<WH6944> and the fine flour,<WH5560> and the wine,<WH3196> and the oil,<WH8081> and the frankincense,<WH3828> and the spices.<WH1314>
And some of<WH4480> the sons<WH1121> of the priests<WH3548> made<WH7543> the ointment<WH4842> of the spices.<WH1314>

And Mattithiah,<WH4993> one of<WH4480> the Levites,<WH3881> who<WH1931> was the firstborn<WH1060> of Shallum<WH7967> the Korahite,<WH7145> had the set office<WH530> over<WH5921> the things that were made<WH4639> in the pans.<WH2281>

And other of<WH4480> their brethren,<WH251> of the sons<WH1121> of<WH4480> the Kohathites,<WH6956> were over<WH5921> the shewbread,<WH3899> <WH4635> to prepare<WH3559> it every sabbath.<WH7676> <WH7676>

And these<WH428> are the singers,<WH7891> chief<WH7218> of the fathers<WH1> of the Levites,<WH3881> who remaining in the chambers<WH3957> were free:<WH6362> for<WH3588> they were employed<WH5921> in that work<WH4399> day<WH3119> and night.<WH3915>
These <WH428> chief<WH7218> fathers<WH1> of the Levites<WH3881> were chief<WH7218> throughout their generations;<WH8435> these<WH428> dwelt<WH3427> at Jerusalem.<WH3389>
And in Gibeon<WH1391> dwelt<WH3427> the father<WH1> of Gibeon,<WH1391> Jehiel,<WH3273> whose wife's<WH802> name<WH8034> was Maachah: <WH4601>
And his firstborn<WH1060> son<WH1121> Abdon,<WH5658> then Zur,<WH6698> and Kish,<WH7027> and Baal,<WH1168> and Ner,<WH5369> and Nadab,<WH5070>
And Gedor,<WH1446> and Ahio,<WH283> and Zechariah,<WH2148> and Mikloth.<WH4732>

And Mikloth<WH4732> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Shimeam.<WH8043> And they<WH1992> also<WH637> dwelt<WH3427> with<WH5973> their brethren<WH251> at Jerusalem,<WH3389> over against<WH5048> their brethren.<WH251>

And Ner<WH5369> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Kish;<WH7027> and Kish<WH7027> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Saul;<WH7586> and Saul<WH7586> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Jonathan,<WH3083> and Malchi-shua,<WH4444> and Abinadab,<WH41> and Esh-baal.<WH792>
And the son<WH1121> of Jonathan<WH3083> was Merib-baal:<WH4807> and Merib-baal<WH4810> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Micah.<WH4318>
And the sons<WH1121> of Micah<WH4318> were, Pithon,<WH6377> and Melech,<WH4429> and Tahrea,<WH8475> and Ahaz.

And Ahaz<WH271> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Jarah;<WH3294> and Jarah<WH3294> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Alemeth,<WH5964> and Azmaveth,<WH5820> and Zimri;<WH2174> and Zimri<WH2174> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Moza;<WH4162>
And Moza<WH4162> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Binea;<WH1150> and Rephaiah<WH7509> his son,<WH1121> Eleasah<WH501> his son,<WH1121> Azel<WH682> his son.<WH1121>

And Azel<WH682> had six<WH8337> sons,<WH1121> whose names<WH8034> are these,<WH428> Azrikam,<WH5840> Bocheru,<WH1074> and Ishmael,<WH3458> and Sheariah,<WH8187> and Obadiah,<WH5662> and Hanan:<WH2605> these<WH428> were the sons<WH1121> of Azel.<WH682>
